page.title: 15Monotype
page.content: This company first came to Salfords in {1897}as the{Lanston Monotype {Corporation}manufactoring precision made printing machinery.First machines sold in 1900.Today Monotype divided into 2 companys:{1.Monotype {Corporation 2.Monotype International. Employs{700 people}making machinery which is sent worldwide. Have no trade with China where there are too many characters in the alphabet.Make new laser equipment which prints 1 sheet of news print in 1/2 minute. Run a training school for people from all over the world.Own 26 houses which are let to present and former employees. {Monotype Sports & Social Club:}Members -995; 2 football pitches &1 5-a side; 4 tennis courts; cricket pitch; bowling green ; netball court; rifle range; club room- pool, darts & bar. {Skittles Tournament}to raise money.
